title: 86. Peter Mohlmam, The Window Witch
itunes:title: 86. Peter Mohlmam, The Window Witch
description: From the catwalk to the department store, there are many modalities of showcasing high fashion. In the realm of window displays, how do you draw people in? For Peter Mohlmam, it's all about seduction. This week, we dive into the wickedly beguiling world of the Window Witch - where fashion design and architecture meet and design is life.
